member.name: T:DotImaging.MethodCache
member.summary: Represents a set of cache decorated methods Taken from: http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/195369/Simple-Method-Caching and slightly modified.

member.name: F:DotImaging.MethodCache.Global
member.summary: Gets the global (singleton) instance of the method cache.

member.name: M:DotImaging.MethodCache.Invoke``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Invokes the target
member.typeparam: The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: The result of invoking the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.MethodCache.Invoke``2(System.Func{``0,``1},``0)
member.summary: Invokes the target
member.typeparam: The type of the parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.param: The argument passed to the parameter of the target method.
member.returns: The result of invoking the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.MethodCache.Invoke``3(System.Func{``0,``1,``2},``0,``1)
member.summary: Invokes the target
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.param: The argument passed to the first parameter of the target method.
The argument passed to the second parameter of the target method.
member.returns: The result of invoking the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.MethodCache.Invoke``4(System.Func{``0,``1,``2,``3},``0,``1,``2)
member.summary: Invokes the target
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.param: The argument passed to the first parameter of the target method.
The argument passed to the second parameter of the target method.
The argument passed to the third parameter of the target method.
member.returns: The result of invoking the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.MethodCache.Invoke``5(System.Func{``0,``1,``2,``3,``4},``0,``1,``2,``3)
member.summary: Invokes the target
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.param: The argument passed to the first parameter of the target method.
The argument passed to the second parameter of the target method.
The argument passed to the third parameter of the target method.
The argument passed to the forth parameter of the target method.
member.returns: The result of invoking the target method.

member.name: T:DotImaging.CacheProvider
member.summary: A class that is capable of decorating a method with a cache.

member.name: M:DotImaging.CacheProvider.Decorate``1(System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Decorates the target by returning a function delegate that points back to a cache for this function.
member.typeparam: The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: A function delegate that represents the cached version of the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.CacheProvider.Decorate``2(System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Decorates the target by returning a function delegate that points back to a cache indexed by the method arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: A function delegate that represents the cached version of the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.CacheProvider.Decorate``3(System.Func{``0,``1,``2})
member.summary: Decorates the target by returning a function delegate that points back to a cache indexed by the method arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: A function delegate that represents the cached version of the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.CacheProvider.Decorate``4(System.Func{``0,``1,``2,``3})
member.summary: Decorates the target by returning a function delegate that points back to a cache indexed by the method arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the second parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: A function delegate that represents the cached version of the target method.

member.name: M:DotImaging.CacheProvider.Decorate``5(System.Func{``0,``1,``2,``3,``4})
member.summary: Decorates the target by returning a function delegate that points back to a cache indexed by the method arguments.
member.typeparam: The type of the first parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.

The type of the third parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the forth parameter of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
The type of the return value of the method that this delegate encapsulates.
member.returns: A function delegate that represents the cached version of the target method.

member.name: T:DotImaging.ColorInfo
member.summary: Gets color information from color type and depth type.

member.name: P:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ColorType
member.summary: Color type (IColor).

member.name: P:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ChannelCount
member.summary: Number of channels that color has.

member.name: P:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ChannelSize
member.summary: Number of bytes per channel.

member.name: P:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ChannelType
member.summary: Channel type. Only primitive types are supported.

member.name: P:DotImaging.ColorInfo.Size
member.summary: Color size. Number of channels multiplied by channel size.

member.name: M:DotImaging.ColorInfo.GetInfo``1
member.summary: Gets color info (depth is taken from color).

member.name: M:DotImaging.ColorInfo.GetInfo(System.Type)
member.summary: Gets color info (depth is taken from color).

member.name: M:DotImaging.ColorInfo.Equals(DotImaging.ColorInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether the object is equal compared to the specified object. A default comparison is used. Please see overloads.
member.returns: True if two objects are equal, false otherwise.

member.name: T:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts
member.summary: Indicates what parts of color info should be compared.

member.name: F:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts.Depth
member.summary: Checks color depth type

member.name: F:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts.BinaryCompatible
member.summary: Checks if one color can be casted to other (if colors are binary compatible).

member.name: F:DotImaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts.Default
member.summary: Checks color type and depth type (if it is true all other properties are equal as well)

member.name: M:DotImaging.ColorInfo.Equals(DotImaging.ColorInfo,DotImaging.ColorInfo.ComparableParts)
member.summary: Compares two color infos.
member.param: Indicates what to compare. Default is: ComparableParts.Default.

member.summary: Get string representation.

member.summary: Provides extensions for color to array conversion.

member.summary: Converts color to array of type .

member.name: T:DotImaging.Copy
member.summary: Provides methods for unsafe data copying as well as extensions for generic image and array cloning.

member.name: T:DotImaging.Copy.UnsafeCopyFunc
member.summary: Copy block of unmanaged memory.

remarks.para: This function is required because of the fact that .NET does not provide any way to copy unmanaged blocks, but provides only methods to copy from unmanaged memory to managed memory and vise versa.

member.name: F:DotImaging.Copy.UnsafeCopy
member.summary: Copy block of unmanaged memory.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Copy.unsafeCopy_ElementByElement(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copy block of unmanaged memory.

remarks.para: This function is required because of the fact that .NET does not provide any way to copy unmanaged blocks, but provides only methods to copy from unmanaged memory to managed memory and vise versa.

member.summary: Copies unmanaged data from the specified source to the specified destination patch.
member.param: Amount of bytes per row to be copied (width for byte fields). (common: image width * color size)

member.summary: IplImage channel data order.

member.summary: Interleaved color channels.

member.summary: Separate color channels. (CreateImage only creates images with interleaved channels.)

member.summary: IplImage data origin.

member.summary: Data origin is located in the top-left corner.

member.summary: Data origin is located in the bottom-left corner (Windows bitmap).

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.StructureSize
member.summary: Size of the structure

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ID
member.summary: Version, always equal 0

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.NumberOfChannels
member.summary: Number of channels. Most OpenCV functions support 1-4 channels.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.AlphaChannel
member.summary: Ignored by OpenCV (set to zero).

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ChannelDepth
member.summary: Channel depth in bits + the optional sign bit

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ColorModel
member.summary: Ignored by OpenCV. The OpenCV function CvtColor requires the source and destination color spaces as parameters.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ChannelSeq
member.summary: Ignored by OpenCV

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.DataOrder
member.summary: Interleaved or separate (not used) channel order.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.Origin
member.summary: Data origin: top-left or bottom-right (not used).

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.Align
member.summary: Alignment of image rows (4 or 8). (Ignored by OpenCV)

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.Width
member.summary: Image width

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.Height
member.summary: Image height

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ROI
member.summary: Region Of Interest (ROI). If not NULL, only this image region will be processed. It is always null if generic image is represented as OpenCV image.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.MaskROI
member.summary: Must be NULL in OpenCV.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ImageId
member.summary: Must be NULL in OpenCV.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.TileInfo
member.summary: Must be NULL in OpenCV.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ImageSize
member.summary: Image data size in bytes.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ImageData
member.summary: A pointer to the aligned image data.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.WidthStep
member.summary: The size of an aligned image row, in bytes.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.BorderMode
member.summary: Border completion mode, ignored by OpenCV.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.BorderConst
member.summary: Border completion mode, ignored by OpenCV.

member.name: F:DotImaging.IplImage.ImageDataOrigin
member.summary: A pointer to the origin of the image data (not necessarily aligned). This is used for image deallocation. During casting between generic image to OpenCV image it is set to null.

member.name: T:DotImaging.Image`1
member.summary:
Implements generic image type and provides a basic data manipulation. Other functions are built as extensions making the class light-weight and portable.
Other extensions and satellite assemblies enables multiple interoperability with other libraries such as AForge.NET, OpenCV, EmguCV.
member.typeparam: Color type. The structure must be blittable.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Image`1.Lock(`0[0:,0:])
member.summary:
Creates an unmanaged image by pinning the provided array.
No data is copied.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Image`1.Lock(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary:
Creates an unmanaged image representation from the provided array and image width (un-flattens the array).
No data is copied.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Image`1.#ctor(System.IntPtr,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Object,System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: Constructs an image from unmanaged data. Data is shared.
member.param: To prevent object from deallocating use this parameter.
If a parent needs to be destroyed or release use this function. (e.g. unpin object - GCHandle)

member.summary: Compares this image to another object. Internally the function overload is called.
member.returns: Is the image equal to an object or not.

member.summary: Image's hash code. Pointer address is used as hash code.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Image`1.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes generic image. In case if data is allocated it is released. If data is shared parent reference (if exists) and parent handle (if exist) is released.

member.name: M:DotImaging.Image`1.Finalize
member.summary: Disposes the image.
